extendedInfo.description: Classic ZUMA style game with more awesome new features.Are you a super fan of Zuma games? If the answer is yes, Marble Blast is the game that you must have. It has a lot of new items to make the game much more interesting and challenging.------------------------------------------------------------How to play:- Shoot to match colored marbles in group of 3 or more;- More marbles, higher score;- Create Combos to cause a chain reaction and earn more opportunities to get awarding items.------------------------------------------------------------Highlighted features:- Well-designed maps, to make the game more enjoyable and addictive.- New items, to make the game more exciting and interesting.We believe that everyone is a gamer at heart and that games are a great source of joy and relaxation. So Ezjoy always try to make the games easy and joy. For Marble Blast, we want to make it the best ZUMA style game on Android and your 5-star reviews keep us inspired and motivated. Visit m.ezjoygame.com from your Android device to see the whole gamelist.Enormous thanks to everyone for their playing, feedback, and support.==========================Ezjoy is the name behind Marble Blast, Jewels Maze, Empire VS Orcs, Bird Blast, Bubble Pop, Devil Hunter, Ice Breaker, Jewels Miner and many other top popular games.==========================

reviews.title: Very cool game indeedy :)
reviews.comment: Love this game.. if u haven\'t tried it, I recommend u try it. Kids would love it too. Am rarely impressed by games in the first few levels but THIS ONE is EXCEPTIONAL!!!!
reviews.author: Debbie McClure

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.comment: Easy to play colorful and fun when playing the sound is not bad yeah I like it peace out
reviews.author: Arthur Watson

reviews.title: fun
reviews.comment: Game is fun there\'s no lag or bugs as far as I can see. Keep up the good work! Still feel like the name bonsai blast was better than marble blast!
reviews.author: Andria Tyner

reviews.title: Very good!
reviews.comment: This  is a fast fun game that keeps you on your toes. Good for the mind. Love it!

reviews.title: Good enjoyable
reviews.comment: Ok nice enjoyable
reviews.author: mani giri

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: Nice game but too many advertisement & dont go to next level. I always hav to quit n reload. Not working after 12th level.
reviews.author: Ritika Garg

reviews.title: So Addicting!
reviews.comment: Love this game! Beat Lvl 91, now what?!  Ranked #1 on lvl 62! Wish there were a way to link it to Facebook or Google + so that your progress stays when you get a new phone.

reviews.title: cool
reviews.comment: good game.lots of fun .

reviews.title: So awesome game. Very addicting games... i will give you 5 stars

reviews.title: #WOW!!!
reviews.comment: So glad google play came up with this game for free. Reminds me so much of my alltime favorite game Luxor. Thankz:)

reviews.title: Marble Blast
reviews.comment: Great Game! If you like ZUMA you\'ll like this one.

reviews.title: Love it!!!
reviews.comment: You have to concentrate playing this game, I mean really con cen trate inorder to get pass the levels, because at times it go faster and you have to try and catch up before they go in the hole. But that\'s just find, because my brain is getting a good workout.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Recommended to all zuma players.this 1 work smooth with my galaxy y compared to other choppy playing zuma

reviews.title: Easy to play
reviews.comment: I have played this kind of game before. Some nice variations and great music.  Very intuitive. Took me half an hour to learn to tap the shooter to change color.
reviews.author: Lori Yard

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: This is one of the best games I\'ve ever played. It teaches stragety and skill. It\'s one of those games where you can\'t stop and need to move to the next level. You don\'t come across a 12-year old every day who would play this than mineceaft to pinman.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Yea great game but needs more background and animation like the classic Zuma\tGood
